channel.title: How is this idea? -Ultimate Top site-
channel.description:
I was thinking we all know how painful it is to have like 500 top sites out there ! but how cool would be if there was a website where it had a top-site list FOR EVERYTHING
-RSPS -Websites -Radio stations -Anything
What do ya think?

item.title: How is this idea? -Ultimate Top site-
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh123 pkerjosh123
item.description:
@pkerjosh123 wrote:

Not trying to force them, just wondering if my idea is a liable idea.

Read full topic
item.source: How is this idea? -Ultimate Top site-

item.title: How is this idea? -Ultimate Top site-
item.dc:creator: @oldschool-scape oldschool-scape
item.description:
@oldschool-scape wrote:

You cant force good idea’s

Read full topic
item.source: How is this idea? -Ultimate Top site-

item.title: How is this idea? -Ultimate Top site-
item.dc:creator: @pkerjosh123 pkerjosh123
item.description:
@pkerjosh123 wrote:

Well my brother is the owner of lolspots Ryan Moriarty he said he can help me out a lot with the user base because he got around 1m users registers and 1.7m likes on Facebook however he said he cannot help me out unless i get a good idea that users would be interested in so that’s why im here for ideas

Read full topic
item.source: How is this idea? -Ultimate Top site-

item.title: How is this idea? -Ultimate Top site-
item.dc:creator: @Ruby_Forums_Coder Ruby
item.description:
@Ruby_Forums_Coder wrote:

There’s probably one out there if I’m honest. I wouldn’t bother creating one unless you have a pretty large user base to follow through and get you higher up and more well known

Read full topic
item.source: How is this idea? -Ultimate Top site-
